info.author: Brian Rosner
info.description:
nip is tool written in Python to provide environment isolation and installation
for Node.js. Installation process is non-existent at this point.

nip is influenced by pip, virtualenv and rip.

More here real soon.
info.name: nip
info.summary: nip is environment isolation and installation for Node.js
